attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for the murder of a police officer whilst on duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The police are the protectors of the law, and should receive the full support of the law when on duty.   Too many police officers have been killed on duty, the best deterrent is the death penalty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
